summary: Software Engineering with a robust background in software development and cybersecurity innovation. Specializes in designing scalable, cloud security, real-time embedded system, and real-time distributed system. Proven ability in leveraging interpreted and compiled programming languages to optimize code for software network systems. Demonstrates a commitment to cross-functional collaboration and delivering high-quality, resilient software.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Conduct research and development within the division to advance networking protocols for Layer 2 Managed Ethernet Switch and Ethernet Security Gateway firmware, ensuring adherence to performance, reliability, and safety standards.
responsibilities: Design C++ APIs to stream configuration changes and notify the PostgreSQL database in real time, such as logging and settings.
Develop and maintain system daemons for managing device state, configuration, and operational data in devices.
Research and implement advanced features for network protocol: IP, UDP, TCP, SNMP, PTP, LDAP, etc.
Perform rigorous testing methods to support multi-level security requirement. UT, integration test, and functional test.
Develop and maintaining skills to support to interns and new associate software engineers, enhancing team capability in using critical networking and security tools.
Maintain comprehensive design and test documentation, including system requirement specifications, test case specifications, and functional tests, to support operational excellence.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: Optimized system performance to support the template development team while ensuring deployment solutions compiled with enterprise security, standards.
responsibilities: Developed deployment scripts using Python to automate the provisioning of F5 BIG-IP Virtual Edition across multiple cloud providers, aligning with cloud-native security practices.
Built and containerized scalable configurations using Docker, integrating CI/CD pipeline tools to streamline secure and efficient deployments.
Led full-stack development for a template scheduling test system, thereby enhancing the efficiency, robustness, and security compliance of F5 BIG-IP Virtual Editions.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Designed and implemented RESTFul API endpoints using Spring Boot.
Built interactive web interfaces with JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap.
Diagnosed and resolved URL-related errors upon the customer's queries.
Developed cloud-based web applications on IBM Bluemix, Splunk, and ServiceNow.
Managed version control with SVN to streamline team collaboration and code integration.
